import React from 'react' import cl from './taskModal.module.scss' import MyTitle from '../MyTitle/MyTitle' const TaskModal = ({ darkMode, taskModal, setTaskModal }) => { const classes = { 1: [cl.taskModal], 2: [cl.taskModal__container] } taskModal ? classes[1].push(cl.open) : false return (
setTaskModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}> Add new task
) } export default TaskModal
